channel.title: Servers owners: how do you advertise?
channel.description:
Or if you're a player, how do you play? How do you find cool servers and how do you connect and play them?
I've been pretty out of touch with the rsps scene for several years now, from both of these perspectives. I'm trying to get a feel for how people like to play servers nowadays, and what the owners like to encourage/allow.
For example, do you let players connect with an IP address or do you force them to use a webclient? Do they have to register on your website first? Do they have to actually download a client jar? What do you think of this as a player?
And how do you link together advertising with gameplay? For example, do you offer rewards for voting on a toplist and do you use any in-game mechanisms to provide these automatically? What other advertising and promotion mechanisms do you use?
Just stick your thoughts here or if you cba to type it'd be cool if u could just fill in my mini survey - [url=https://www.surveymonkey.co.uk/r/QF7HQ7D]https://www.surveymonkey.co.uk/r/QF7HQ7D[/url] (bonus - leave your contact details to get some free advertising for your server)
